title: Antlion Charger
summaries: The Antlion Charger is an enemy similar in appearance to the Antlion, and is found in the Underground Desert or on surface Deserts during pre-Hardmode Sandstorms. Unlike the Antlion, the Antlion Charger will, as its name suggests, charge at the player instead of remaining stationary. It can jump over blocks and will gradually build up speed while moving before charging the player. It can rarely drop the Mandible Blade.

statistics.Environment: Underground Desert Sandstorm
